page.title: 13TRADE
page.content:
{Old Shops. {By KAREN }
In 1841 in Bishops Nympton there were lots of shops but slowy through the years shops are getting fewer and some of the shops were --------------- {Tailor -Edward Bawden, {Butcher -Thomas Bond, {Baker -Hugh Chanter, {Clockmender-William Gould, {Grocer -Abraham Cole, {Butcher -John Mildon, Then there were even fewer shops. In 1958 the shops were like this----- {1 Butcher,} {1 Grocer, {1 Confectioner, {2 Bakers, and now there is only one shop in Bishops Nympton and the Post Office is joined on to it.
